speaker: President Gordon B. Hinckley
title: The Sustaining of Church Officers
description: There have been no changes among the General Authorities since the last general conference. It is therefore proposed that we sustain all of the General Authorities and general officers of the Church as at present constituted.
body: There have been no changes among the General Authorities since the last general conference. It is therefore proposed that we sustain all of the General Authorities and general officers of the Church as at present constituted.
Those in favor may manifest it by the uplifted hand. Any opposed may manifest it by the uplifted hand.
